document.full_text: mississippi corrections officials on tuesday executed a man convicted in the 1998 slayings of four people, the first inmate in the state to be put to death using a new drug as part of the lethal injection.
document.title: mississippi executes man for murder of four people
lines_and_colors: mississippi corrections officials on tuesday executed a man convicted in the 1998 slayings of four people, the first inmate in the state to be put to death using a new drug as part of the lethal injection.
